about.domain: How many candidates have their own internet domain?
about.complete: Hi, I'm Javier Sanchez. I'm dedicated to visually improving web pages in the IT sector. They call us Frontend Developers. I started programming in 2018 at my institute, I finished projects in JavaScript, I improved as a programmer, and now I'm constantly creating incredible personal projects.
